channel.title: v14 default gateway name sys-whonix or sys-whonix-14?
channel.description:
In [the docs](https://www.whonix.org/wiki/Upgrading_Whonix_13_to_Whonix_14#Qubes-Whonix_Only) it's referenced both ways, but mostly as `sys-whonix-14`.
However in the [salt file](https://github.com/QubesOS/qubes-mgmt-salt-dom0-virtual-machines/blob/master/qvm/updates-via-whonix.sls) it's called `sys-whonix`.
Which one is correct?

item.title: v14 default gateway name sys-whonix or sys-whonix-14?
item.dc:creator: torjunkie
item.description:
sys-whonix in all default installs

That page section refers to sys-whonix-14 ProxyVM only as an optional configuration.

Read full topic
item.source: v14 default gateway name sys-whonix or sys-whonix-14?
